response:
Bilateral spasticity, clonus and extensor plantar responses with distal proprioceptive loss indicate bilateral corticospinal and dorsal column involvement at cervical level. Concurrent right limb ataxia with gaze-evoked nystagmus, mild right Horner’s and ipsilateral palatal weakness (uvula deviates left) localise to a right lateral medullary/inferior cerebellar peduncle process. Minimum lesions: a cervical cord lesion plus a right lateral medullary lesion.

lesion_locations = ["bilateral cervical spinal cord", "right lateral medulla"]
